title: Trump threatens to block the opening of US-Canada bridge
shortDescription: The Gordie Howe International Bridge, a $4.6 billion infrastructure project that connects Detroit with Windsor, Ontario, was approved in 2014.

title: Will DHS shut down? Reform talks between Dems, White House ongoing
shortDescription: Lawmakers have only a matter of days to stave off a shutdown of the much-scrutinized agency – though ICE would continue to operate.

title: Trump excludes two Democrats from White House dinner with governors
shortDescription: President Trump has excluded two Democratic governors, Wes Moore of Maryland and Jared Polis of Colorado, from a White House dinner with governors.

title: Multifaith groups sue Trump's Religious Liberty Commission over lack of diversity
shortDescription: The complaint said the commission lacks the perspective of those "who face some of the most pernicious discrimination."

title: Trump calls it the 'Gulf of America,' but what about locals, tourists?
shortDescription: It's been a year since President Trump renamed the Gulf of Mexico the Gulf of America. We asked people along its shores what they actually call it.

title: Trump asks Supreme Court to throw out E. Jean Carroll’s $5 million verdict
shortDescription: President Donald Trump asked the U.S. Supreme Court on Monday to throw out a jury’s finding in a civil lawsuit that he sexually abused writer E. Jean Carroll in the mid-1990s.

title: How to watch Trump's NBC interview before Super Bowl
shortDescription: An interview with President Donald Trump will air before the Super Bowl. Here's when and how to watch it.

title: Will Trump be at Super Bowl 60? What to know
shortDescription: The New England Patriots and Seattle Seahawks are ready for Super Bowl 60, but will the president be in attendance?

title: 'Deeply damaging': Trump's Supreme Court push to toss E. Jean Carroll case
shortDescription: Despite frequently filing his own lawsuits, President Trump told the Supreme Court a suit against him by E. Jean Carroll is a damaging distraction.

title: Meet the agency Trump just can’t seem to axe
shortDescription: The White House is continuing its efforts to dismantle the Education Department, but Congress just fully funded it.

title: Obamas cheer on US Olympic team, silent on racist Trump ape post
shortDescription: The power couple has rarely responded to Trump’s provocations. Supporters said it's an example of "when they go low, we go high."

title: Trump won't apologize for posting Obama ape video
shortDescription: President Donald Trump declined to apologize for sharing a video depicting former President Barack Obama and first lady Michelle Obama as apes.
